string.name: 1/intro
string.value: This application displays the system activity and other applications' activity to notify the user of what is currently happening.

string.name: 2/display
string.value: The messages displayed can be adjusted by the display options. To show the options, go to the 'Config' tab of this window and to the 'Display' section.

string.name: 2/level
string.value: 'Report level' sets the amount of messages shown. The more detail options will show more messages.

string.name: 2/period
string.value: 'Display period' will adjust the time the messages are shown. When expired, the messages will disappear.

string.name: 2/dev
string.value: To view messages intended for developers, click the developer message option. For casual uses, this option should be turned off.

string.name: 2/apply
string.value: By clicking on the 'Apply' button, the changes will take effect.
